mapper.select: select id, createTime, createBy, updateTime, updateBy, activity_id, file_name, file_type, file_extension, file_path from activity_file where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into activity_file(id,createTime, createBy, updateTime, updateBy, activity_id, file_name, file_type, file_extension, file_path) values (#{activityFile.id},#{activityFile.createtime}, #{activityFile.createby}, #{activityFile.updatetime}, #{activityFile.updateby}, #{activityFile.activityId}, #{activityFile.fileName}, #{activityFile.fileType}, #{activityFile.fileExtension}, #{activityFile.filePath})

insert into activity_file(createTime, createBy, updateTime, updateBy, activity_id, file_name, file_type, file_extension, file_path) values
(#{entity.createtime}, #{entity.createby}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.updateby}, #{entity.activityId}, #{entity.fileName}, #{entity.fileType}, #{entity.fileExtension}, #{entity.filePath})

insert into activity_file(createTime, createBy, updateTime, updateBy, activity_id, file_name, file_type, file_extension, file_path) values
(#{entity.createtime}, #{entity.createby}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.updateby}, #{entity.activityId}, #{entity.fileName}, #{entity.fileType}, #{entity.fileExtension}, #{entity.filePath})
on duplicate key update createTime = values(createTime), createBy = values(createBy), updateTime = values(updateTime), updateBy = values(updateBy), activity_id = values(activity_id), file_name = values(file_name), file_type = values(file_type), file_extension = values(file_extension), file_path = values(file_path)
mapper.update:
update activity_file
createTime = #{createtime},
createBy = #{createby},
updateTime = #{updatetime},
updateBy = #{updateby},
activity_id = #{activityId},
file_name = #{fileName},
file_type = #{fileType},
file_extension = #{fileExtension},
file_path = #{filePath},
where id = #{id}
